scripts.build:local: npm run typegen && npm run routes:generate && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build: npm run routes:generate && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.routes:docs: echo 'üìö TANSTACK ROUTER DOCUMENTATION' && echo '================================' && echo '' && echo 'üîß HOW ROUTING WORKS:' && echo '1. Main App (src/App.tsx) uses React Router' && echo '2. Routes /dashboard/* to DashboardApp component' && echo '3. DashboardApp uses TanStack Router with basepath: /dashboard' && echo '4. TanStack Router uses src/routeTree.gen.ts (NOT dashboardRouteTree.gen.ts)' && echo '' && echo 'üìÅ ROUTE STRUCTURE:' && echo 'src/routes/_authenticated/' && echo '‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ invoices/index.tsx ‚Üí /dashboard/invoices' && echo '‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ refunds/index.tsx ‚Üí /dashboard/refunds' && echo '‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ transactions/index.tsx ‚Üí /dashboard/transactions' && echo '‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ orders/index.tsx ‚Üí /dashboard/orders' && echo '‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ...' && echo '' && echo 'üöÄ COMMANDS:' && echo 'npm run routes:generate  - Generate routes once' && echo 'npm run routes:watch    - Watch for changes and auto-generate' && echo 'npm run routes:show     - Display all available routes' && echo 'npm run routes:docs     - Show this documentation' && echo '' && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  IMPORTANT NOTES:' && echo '- DashboardApp MUST use src/routeTree.gen.ts (not dashboardRouteTree.gen.ts)' && echo '- Routes are defined as /_authenticated/routeName/' && echo '- URLs are accessible at /dashboard/routeName' && echo '- Sidebar navigation uses /routeName (relative to basepath)' && echo '' && echo 'üîç TROUBLESHOOTING:' && echo 'If routes show 404:' && echo '1. Check DashboardApp.tsx uses correct routeTree.gen.ts' && echo '2. Run npm run routes:generate' && echo '3. Check route files exist in src/routes/_authenticated/' && echo '4. Verify routes in FileRoutesByFullPath interface'
scripts.routes:check: echo 'üîç ROUTING SETUP CHECK' && echo '=====================' && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ Checking DashboardApp.tsx...' && if grep -q 'routeTree.*routeTree.gen' src/DashboardApp.tsx; then echo '‚úÖ DashboardApp uses correct routeTree.gen.ts'; else echo '‚ùå DashboardApp uses wrong route tree file!'; fi && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ Checking route files...' && if [ -f 'src/routes/_authenticated/invoices/index.tsx' ]; then echo '‚úÖ Invoices route exists'; else echo '‚ùå Invoices route missing'; fi && if [ -f 'src/routes/_authenticated/refunds/index.tsx' ]; then echo '‚úÖ Refunds route exists'; else echo '‚ùå Refunds route missing'; fi && if [ -f 'src/routes/_authenticated/transactions/index.tsx' ]; then echo '‚úÖ Transactions route exists'; else echo '‚ùå Transactions route missing'; fi && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ Checking route tree...' && if [ -f 'src/routeTree.gen.ts' ]; then echo '‚úÖ routeTree.gen.ts exists'; else echo '‚ùå routeTree.gen.ts missing'; fi && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ Checking financial routes in route tree...' && if grep -q 'invoices.*AuthenticatedInvoicesIndexRoute' src/routeTree.gen.ts; then echo '‚úÖ Invoices route in FileRoutesByFullPath'; else echo '‚ùå Invoices route missing from FileRoutesByFullPath'; fi && if grep -q 'refunds.*AuthenticatedRefundsIndexRoute' src/routeTree.gen.ts; then echo '‚úÖ Refunds route in FileRoutesByFullPath'; else echo '‚ùå Refunds route missing from FileRoutesByFullPath'; fi && if grep -q 'transactions.*AuthenticatedTransactionsIndexRoute' src/routeTree.gen.ts; then echo '‚úÖ Transactions route in FileRoutesByFullPath'; else echo '‚ùå Transactions route missing from FileRoutesByFullPath'; fi && echo '' && echo 'üéØ Run npm run routes:docs for full documentation'
